mapper.insert: INSERT INTO assets_report (id, projectName, assessReportNum, assessObject, valueTime, assessAim, assessMethod, reportType, branchOffice, upFileURI, assessedUnitName, isStateAssets, isPrivateAsset, valueType, assessResult, assessDate, assetsReportDate, actualFee, assetsFee, noAssetsFee, debtFee, noDebtFee, netAssets, noNetAssets,wordUri,pdfUri,checker,assessObj,client) VALUES (#{id},#{projectName}, #{assessReportNum}, #{assessObject}, #{valueTime}, #{assessAim}, #{assessMethod}, #{reportType}, #{branchOffice},#{upFileURI},#{assessedUnitName}, #{isStateAssets},#{isPrivateAsset}, #{valueType}, #{assessResult},#{assessDate}, #{assetsReportDate},#{actualFee},#{assetsFee}, #{noAssetsFee},#{debtFee},#{noDebtFee}, #{netAssets},#{noNetAssets}, #{wordUri},#{pdfUri},#{checker},#{assessObj},#{client});
mapper.update:
UPDATE assets_report SET
projectName=#{projectName},
assessReportNum=#{assessReportNum},
assessObject=#{assessObject},
assessObj=#{assessObj},
valueTime=#{valueTime}, assessAim=#{assessAim}, assessMethod=#{assessMethod}, reportType=#{reportType},branchOffice=#{branchOffice},upFileURI=#{upFileURI}, assessedUnitName=#{assessedUnitName}, isStateAssets=#{isStateAssets},isPrivateAsset=#{isPrivateAsset}, valueType=#{valueType},assessResult= #{assessResult},assessDate=#{assessDate}, assetsReportDate=#{assetsReportDate}, actualFee=#{actualFee},assetsFee=#{assetsFee}, noAssetsFee=#{noAssetsFee},debtFee=#{debtFee},noDebtFee=#{noDebtFee}, netAssets=#{netAssets},noNetAssets=#{noNetAssets},client=#{client},
wordUri=#{wordUri},
pdfUri=#{pdfUri},
checker=#{checker},
id=#{id} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, projectName, assessReportNum,assessObject, valueTime, assessAim, assessMethod, reportType, branchOffice, upFileURI, assessedUnitName, isStateAssets, isPrivateAsset, valueType, assessResult, assessDate, assetsReportDate, actualFee, assetsFee, noAssetsFee, debtFee, noDebtFee, netAssets, noNetAssets,wordUri,pdfUri,checker,client,assessObj FROM assets_report where id=#{id}
